content: >this pattern is available for downloading also on payhip 2 with a pay what you want option the english title of the pattern is **lady-in-waiting socks** >ohjeet suomeksi ullassa 1/14 1 nimellä hovineito huomaathan että suomenkielisestä ohjeesta puuttuu suurin koko 64 s **features of the english pattern ** - knitted cuff-down - instructions written in metric and us terminology - instructions written for magic loop but dpns can be used as well - three sizes small 48 sts medium 56 sts and large 64 sts - slipped-stitch heel flap and a round heel turn - star toe can be replaced by any stockinette toe - charts but no written instructions for the cable pattern 1 http //www ullaneule net/0114/ohjeet_hovineito html 2 https //payhip com/b/6wno3
